name: Aéroclub Royal Fès Saïss
about: Aéroclub Royal Fès Saïss, located at Fès Saïss Airport, offers a unique and privileged setting with breathtaking views of the Atlas Mountains. As an accredited pilot school, we provide theoretical and practical training for obtaining a Private Pilot License (PPL). Our experienced and qualified instructors ensure comprehensive education and safety. We also offer discovery flights, allowing you to experience the stunning panoramas of Fez's Medina, Imouzer, and Sefrou from the air. Each discovery flight is conducted by an experienced pilot and includes a certificate of completion. Whether you are aspiring to become a pilot or simply looking for a memorable aerial experience, Aéroclub Royal Fès Saïss is your ideal choice for aviation training and discovery in Morocco.
